Reviews.Content: stayed sheraton city center baltimore 3 nights business july 2010 reading prior reviews expected worse typical businessclass hotel downtown upgraded corner roomnice windows 2 starwood club free told refrigerator supplied additional cost 20 night found ridiculous gym lots cardio equipment limited weights machines major temperature oven final day water coolers empty staff brought water bottles disappeared quickly pool popular head bellhop helpful directions staff courteous prior guests staff replaced maybe guests issues own hangers closet 6 nicely upgraded albeit bathroom huge king bed street noise 9th floor goodsize desk tv yes dated decor traveling business doesnt matter gyro stand corner exit front hotel left block actually corner street literally twominute walk street food ive street food beijing hong kong bangkok hanoi ho chi city picture huge lamb gyro hot spicy 4 485 soda deal town outrageously 3 gyros home baltimore hotel fine deserving negative remarks reviews

Reviews.Author: nb1685
Reviews.Content: booked hotel hotwire read reviews learned staying seeing stellar reviews little worried expect pleasantly surprised true brand hotel wear stood horrible dirty reviewers claimed issue light hall little creepy grab water reported front desk hotel half hour sent fix light employees contact friendly helpful decent super fancy clean hotel walking distance inner harbor pretty cheap cab ride tired walking day liked stay directly harbor price location reviewer commented tonys diner street looks dive outside nice inside food nicest servers dealt entire time baltimore

Reviews.Title: “Shouldn't be a first choice”
Reviews.Author: Grovemontjanet
Reviews.Content: stayed business trip lobby nicely helpful conciege front desk staff rest hotel including meeting badly renovation rundown stained carpet dirty mildewed bathroom special extra except coffee maker hairdryer street noise sleeping inner harbor five blocks camden yards walking distance cab safety

Reviews.Title: “Common Areas Need Improvement”
Reviews.Author: trvlpepl
Reviews.Content: hotel bit worn edges lobby hallways cleanest parking garage smelled badly granted parking garages smell smelled bad common looked vacuuming carpet thorough cleaning ok location hotel walking distance inner harbor probably stay

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, conveniently located”
Reviews.Author: AweSumThenSum
Reviews.Content: 2 am saturday check late checkout monday fantastic experience hotel staff courteous cheerful extremely helpful pool refreshing heated located spot doesnt sun inner harbor approximately 10 minute walk hotel close convention center sports arenas

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel, very good location!”
Reviews.Author: louise71594
Reviews.Content: despite negative reviews hotel checked july 2nd 1 night check quick upgraded corner deluxe king comes starwoods preferred guest nice treat pretty decent ie nice comfortable king bed fairly decorated adequate bathroom tub especially 80s day spend time pool fancy spacious plenty lounge chairs parking bit expensive expected added parking fee bill plus including parking night bad staying harbor easily 75 100 location perfect ie 3 blocks harbor walking distance convenience stores nice little diner bar street name tonys bartender rob killer drinks ate breakfast morning meal pretty 499 included 2 eggs home fries toast choice meat hubby waffle home fries meat 200 people complained downtown location typical urban downtown location locals tourists walking city city saturday night actually pretty quiet harbor twice bad cops walking beat quick overnight getaway hotel fit bill time spent harbor hours spent hotel pool overall enjoyed overnight stay rated service 3 stars except check looking forward returning summer

Reviews.Title: “Felt low rent - needs some work.”
Reviews.Author: BaltimoreFrancophile
Reviews.Content: hotel isnt completely appalling definitely maintenance minimum halls dimly lit feel dingy chips tub wallpaper hallway torn frayed lobby okay sitting wasnt nice stains carpet broken lampshade honestly budget chain hotel city hotel

Reviews.Title: “Not sure if would stay again”
Reviews.Author: gt_a_lif
Reviews.Content: platinum am stay lobby nicely staff extremely friendly seen time upgraded bathroom nicely stocked barely fits sink wc sit desk tv neighborhood bit sketchy lounge 100 degrees selection tired hot food steam burned hand sheraton stayed

Reviews.Title: “Alright for just one night”
Reviews.Author: BON3S
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel told wouldnt available starwood spending time walking harbour looking lunch hotel available hotel north tower hotel 16th floor wasnt bad except bathroom newborn baby couldnt fit evening fitness centre extremely cold bad sweat bad frost bite sweat drips pool alright except lifeguard couldnt speak english bad help overall hotel alright recommend night 30 bwi airport hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location, but nutty parking situation”
Reviews.Author: taygil
Reviews.Content: native spent pleasant weekend getaway night hotel enjoying evening event 1st mariner arena street convenience couldnt beat clean service evening selfparking unavailable reliant expensive valet parking checkout uncomfortable hot 45 minute wait outside car irony twice car drive home

Reviews.Title: “Much Better Than The Reviews”
Reviews.Author: NoMoreStatus
Reviews.Content: booked hotel business am starwood concerned looked reviews staff courteous appropriate helpful nice corner north tower helped little noisey bearable liked shower bathroom clean modern reference comment location isnt walkable harbour am assuming person doesnt walk car house 6 blocks trek
